Model: KOUKAAM KNR-2008 IPCorder NVR 8 channel network video recorder
Product name: KOUKAAM KNR-2008 IPCorder NVR 8 channel network video recorder
Product description: KOUKAAM KNR-2008 IPCorderThe Koukaam KNR-2008 IPCorder is a Network Video Recorder for up to 8 Cameras with PC, AppleMac & Linux compatibility. The KNR-2008 IPCorder comes with a  Smart Phone App for Apple and Android to view video remotely using your smartphone.The KNR-2008 IPCorder supports upto 5MP cameras. The KNR-2008 IPCorder supports Max whole data stream 32Mb/s, 2 x HDDs @ 3TB giving 6 TB total storage The KNR-2000 series is more powerful successor of KNR 200 series. This NVR is designed for management of middle-size IP camera systems and allows remote access from all standard Internet browsers . It supports each of the most common operating systems: Microsoft® Windows®, Apple® OS X® and Linux. Provides an easy access to live video, playback and configuration, and offers easy installation and usage and supports a wide range of cameras including ONVIF compliant devices. Technical support is available in many languages.With the mobile application – IPCorder Mobile app – you can also connect to IPCorder with smartphones or tablets.For management of several IPCorders is now unique hardware CMS available – IPCorder Group.Download the Android Phone App from Google Play hereKey Features or the KNR-2008 IPCorderStandalone Linux based NVRManage/Record/View up to 8 IP cameras/videoservers simultaneouslyScrewless hard drive installationWeb based access using Java - supports Microsoft Windows (Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox etc.), Linux and Apple Mac OSOpen solution - support of various IP cameras from different manufacturersEasy setup of the unit and connected devices (many tasks done automatically)Easy recordings search, playback and exportEasy remote access from the Internet - Fully automatic or Manual router setupTruly Megapixel Ready - up to 5 megapixel cameras supportedRule scripting language for programming custom scriptsSupport of I/O devices, values also available for scripting2× 3.5" SATA I or II hard drive (not included)High stability, no viruses, no spywareCompact size and quiet operationLow power consumption - green and cost effective solutionOther FeaturesSimultaneous display of more camera views in user defined matrixUnique digital zoom feature with digital pan/tiltSearch recordings by motion detection or digital input events with date-time intervalValue/event charts displayed during searchDisplay of numerical values from IPCorder, cameras and sensorsSchedules for recording and Rule limitationDHCP/static network configurationNTP client for time synchronizationUPnP Presentation for easy search for IPCorders in networkAutomatic recovery after power outageUnique features of IPCorder KNR-2000 series2 bays for 3.5″ SATA hard disc (up to 3 TB per HDD)Up to 8 IP cameras or videoserversRAID array support for data protection in case of HDD failure2 x gigabit LAN redundant network connectionsScrew less HDD installationIntegrated alarm buzzer to inform about failure statusAttractive design with the ability to change the colour of the Light StripNetworking10/100/1000 Mbit/sInterface1× USB (not used)Storage1× 3.5" SATA hard drive (SATA I or II, up to 2TB capacity)Total storage capacity up to 2TBHard drive not includedRecording ModesPermanent or based on events (Motion Detection, digital input trigger etc.), both modes can work in defined SchedulesRemote AccessRouter control - Off, Automatic, Static forwardingSupported Cameras/VideoserversUp to 8 cameras/videoserversList of supported devicesOther Supported DevicesUnlimited number of I/O devicesKOUKAAM NETIO-230AExternal I/O and sensor (temperature, humidity etc.) devices from company HW Group – Poseidon and Damocles productsSupported Browsers (FW 1.3.x)Java based viewingMicrosoft Windows: Microsoft Internet Explorer 7.0 and 8.0 (32-bit only) and higher, Mozilla Firefox 3.0 and higherLinux 32/64bit: Mozilla Firefox 3.0 and higherMacOS X: Safari 4 and higherDimensions and WeightSize: 120 x 85 x 425 mm (W x H x D)Weight of device: 1.7 KgPower: 12 V DCPower consumption: min. 7.5W (without of HDD), typical 19W (2 x HDD green edition), max. 48W (2 x 2TB standard HDD)Power12 V DCOperating Temperature0 – 40 °CApprovalsCE, FCC, RoHSPackage ContentsIPCorder KNR-2008Power adaptor 100 – 240 V AC, 50/60 Hz to 12 V DCPower cable (Shuko type plug)Quick Installation Guide, License agreementCD with Discover Utility and documentation

GOOGO™ software can change the password on their own by the customer on phone and tablet PC , and GOOGO™ CAMERA can take photographs and record the audio and video. Model: VoiceKeeper FSM-U1 voice scrambler anti-wiretapping system for smartphones
Product name: VoiceKeeper FSM-U1 voice scrambler anti-wiretapping system for smartphones
Product description: VoiceKeeper FSM-U1 voice scrambler anti-wiretapping system for smartphonesComprehensive anti-wiretapping system for Any Smartphone preventing your mobile phone calls from being tapped or listened to by unwanted parties, creating a secure connection between the two handsets.   Professional Mobile Phone Scrambler compatible with any smart phones    VoiceKeeper FSM-U1            Unique Selling Points        How to use  1. Connecting your VoiceKeeper  Turn on the power of VoiceKeeper by   pushing the power switch up. After the charging indicator and the   Secured call status indicator blinks in order, the device stays on   standby status. If smart phone is not connected to VoiceKeeper, the   secured call status indicator will continue to blink in red light.  Connect   VoiceKeeper to the Ear-Microphone terminal of your smart phone as shown   in the figure.(Push down until hearing the sound "tick".) If the   secured call status indicator stops blinking in red light, it indicates   that your smart phone and VoiceKeeper has been properly connected.(Pole   sequence of the plug may vary depending on the smart phones, but if the   secured   call status indicator stops   blinking in red light, it means that it is ready for use by   automatically changing the pole sequence of the plug). If it continues   to flash in red light, remove the smart  phone connection and then   connect VoiceKeeper again from the beginning.    After confirming the   secured call status indicator does not blink, gently press Secure Button   on the device. (The rotary plug will enable you to place VoiceKeeper in   the center of smart phone, regardless of the thickness of your smart   phone and the position of the ear-microphone terminal. You may locate   VoiceKeeper on the backside of your smart phone if needed.)         2. Ordinary call (not secured)  You can make ordinary calls (Your   conversation on the phone will not be secured.) after removing   VoiceKeeper, or without removing it with power-on status of VoiceKeeper.     3. Secured call  At first, in order to generate secured communications between two parties, Each party should have this device.   A. Connect VoiceKeeper to smart phone for secured conversation between them.  B. Push the volume button of smart phone up to the highest level at both ends.   C. The requester of secured call should press “Secure button” on the front side of VoiceKeeper just one time. (At this time, the other party should wait without any action. Make sure the Secure button should be pressed only by the secured call requester.)D. Now, you can hear the sound of exchanging signals with the secured call status indicator blinking in blue and red lights at both ends.E. After a little while, you can hear a beep sound from the speaker with the secured call status indicator light staying in blue, which indicates that the signal exchange for secured conversation has been completed successfully.About 1 or 2 seconds after the   completion of signal exchange, you will be able to hear the voice from   the other party clearly and now your conversations on the phone are   secured against wiretapping or eavesdropping.     4. Charging VoiceKeeper  You can recharge VoiceKeeper by   connecting USB charging cable included in the product package to your   PC's USB port or a USB travel charger (output voltage 5V). For full   charge, it will take approximately 2 hours. During charging, the   charging & battery level indicator lights up in red, turning orange   and then green depending on the state of charging.(Lights green when   charging is complete.)        The remaining time of your smart phone   battery depending on the color of the charging and battery level   indicator is shown below.                 Blinking red : less than 10 minutes, need to charge    Red light: less than 20 minutes, need to charge    Orange light: less than 30 minutes    Green   light: more than 30 minutes can be used You can prevent the situation   where you cannot use VoiceKeeper due to a low battery if you charge it at the same time when charging your smart phone. (We recommend you to carry USB charging cable all the time.)     VoiceKeeper product package includes only a USB charging cable and we do not provide a separate charger.     Product Specifications  1. Dimensions: 29.0 (W) * 7.2 (D) * 69.0mm (H) (excluding plug part)  2. Weight: 20g  3. Battery: Lithium-Polymer 3.7V 300mA  4. Battery life: about 2.5 hours (talking continuously in Secured Communication mode)  5. Method of connection: ear-microphone terminal ø3.5  4 poles  6. Main Chipset: VK-2011  7. Method of communication: using VoiceKeeper built-in speaker and microphone  8. Method of securing signal exchange: One-time code generation and auto-connection method  9. Method of charging: micro-USB 5-pin (the same specifications with Android phone charging adapter)

Product description: TE968H 5-inch HD Portable 5.8GHz wireless  mini DVR supports wireless and wired cameras     The latest 5-inch HD Portable 5.4GHz wireless  mini DVR-TE968H   supports wireless & wired camera, photo function; motion detect   recording, cycle recording, memory up to 32G card.TE968H   is a new generation portable mini DVR developed by our company.It   supports both wireless and wired cameras. Not only this, it adds new   function of photo, motion detect, loop recording, power saving (auto   shutdown, auto off-screen), etc. This DVR is the ideal choice for security & protection, evidence & investigation, like police,   household, sports, automotive industry, shops, etc.. At the same time,   with its stylish and high-end appearance, it also becomes the fashion   choice of leisure goods.Advantages：            Mini size and portable recorder with fashionable & new design;                     5-inch super large HD screen (800X480pix), which provides clear and smooth image;                     Built-in 3200mAh high capacity Li-battery provides super long recording time up to 9.5 hours;                     Supports storage up to 32G TF card, which records up to 32 hours;                     Supports 2.4G/5.8G wireless frequency(you should choose 2.4G or 5.8G when you order);            8 channels auto/manual switch;        Folding hidden external antenna assures excellent wireless receiving;         Supports AV IN function: receiving signal from wired cameras;         Photo function: it can take, review & store pictures;         Supports intelligent motion detect video recording;        Overwrite: It supports loop recording, which can automatically overwrite when storage is full;         Seamless continuous record:No intermittent recording, it will not miss any detail and wonderfulness;         Support power-saving mode: automatic shutdown, automatic off-screen;         Equipped with full set of mounting brackets, it can be hand-held, stand desktop, hanging on the wall, placed inside the car, different occasions;        It’s of high compatibility, which supports almost all computer operating system, including MAC;         Supports multi-language. Model: DVR-730 Wireless USB DVR small size USB receiver DVR, image capture, live video, motion detection
Product name: DVR-730 Wireless USB DVR small size USB receiver DVR, image capture, live video, motion detection
Product description: DVR-730 Wireless USB DVR small size USB receiver DVR, image capture, live video, motion detection            The DVR-730 is an ultra mobile USB DVR that supports 4 channels and will capture and store live video and images onto the hard drive of any laptop or PC.       Features:-- Wireless receive and record A/V signal from wireless cameras (up to 4 cameras, auto-scan)--USB 2.0 output to PC, transmission rate up to 480Mpit/s--   --Motion detection: If any intruder, it alarms with sound, and at same   time  capture picture saving in hard disk or send e-mail to long-range   PC-- High resolution image capture (1440X1152pix)-- High speed real time video record, 720 X576 pix@ 30pfs  -- Support MSN Messenger & Skype for long-range live video, like a web camera--Sharp and nature image with true color.  -- 4 channels available to avoid possible interference--Record file format AVI and play with Windows Media Player  -- Supports Windows 2000/XP/Vista  -- Small size (100X28X15mm,41g) and beautiful appearance Functions:1. Send e-mails attachment with image.2. Save image on Hard Disk.3. Sound alarm.4. Video signal filter, for filtrate Active and Invalid channel.5. Signal lost alarm.6. Motion Detection.7. Adjustable sensitivity.8. Automatically lock, while not any operate.9. Schedule Monitoring sessions, for timer snap.10. Record video/audio (with usb2.0 audio interface), snap shot.11. Automatic Space Management. Stop recorder or capture still automatically on disk full.12. Support 4 Channel video inputting on one computer.13. Support on Screen Display. Display date and time, or channel description on video.14. Supports manual open/close Invalid channel, or add/delete channel description.15. Supports login and logout, by User Name and Password.16. Supports running background stealthy.17. One video/audio input18. Receiving Frequency: channel 1: 2.414GHZ channel 2: 2.432GHZ channel 3: 2.450GHZ channel 4: 2.468GHZAccessories ：Antenna 1 PCDC/AV cable 1 PCUser manual CD 1 PCSpecification:  Power Supply:  Provided by USB Port  Consumption Current (Max.): 180mA  Receiving Frequency: ISM 2,400MHz~2,483MHz  Input VSWR: 2:1  Demodulation Type: FM  Intermediate Frequency: 480MHz  Frequency Stabilization: +/- 100 ppm  Local Leakage at RF Input Terminal: <=-55 dBm  Receiving Sensitivity: <= -85 dBm  Video Output Signal Impedance: 75 ohm  Video Output Signal Level: 1.0 V +/- 0.15 Vpp  Video Output Signal Polarity: Negative  Video S/N Ratio: 38dB  Audio Output Signal Impedance: 600 ohm  Audio Output Signal Level: 1.25 V +/- 0.25 Vpp / 1 kHz  Audio Output Frequency Range: 250 Hz ~ 10 kHz  Left Subcarrier Frequency: 6.0 MHz  Unobstructed Effective Range: 100 m (Min.)  Dimensions(WxLxH): 10X2.8X1.5cm (Excluding Antenna)  Weight : 41 g

Model: TE892H-A 5.8GHz Wireless Mini Camera DVR Kit-- (90 deg VOA, 16 CHs, 0.008lux, 5" HD DVR, motion detect, 32GB)
Product name: TE892H-A 5.8GHz Wireless Mini Camera DVR Kit-- (90 deg VOA, 16 CHs, 0.008lux, 5" HD DVR, motion detect, 32GB)
Product description: TE892H-A 5.8GHz Wireless Mini Camera DVR Kit-- (90 deg VOA, 16 CHs, 0.008lux, 5" HD DVR, motion detect, 32GB)                  Model:TE892H      This kit includes a very tiny wireless camera and a 5-inch LCD DVR, which adopt no-interference 5.8G frequency.It transmits 100 meters range. The   size of camera is smaller than finger, which is suitable to install it   into narrow and hard-to-reach room. Users can view the instant video on   this 5 inch HD screen. They also can record videos and take   pictures.Motion detect & loop recording are available for more   convenience use.Just connect the camera to AV power supply ,it starts to   continuous working.Just plug & play! It is a good helper for safe & security.   Main Features      1. No-interference 5.8G frequency, no need to worry about interference from general 2.4G frequency;  2.  16 channels available, users can freely choose one when they use it;  3. 0.008LUX super low illumination, which can see clearly under dim light;  5. 90° broad view angle；  6.  Low power consumption assures the long time working life;  7.  25mW transmitting power, which leads 100 meters wireless transmission range  8. High resolution 5-inch large screen DVR playback clear video instantly without connecting to computer;  9. Motion Detection Available : Record only when there is movement detected(Replaced CCTV 24 Hrs Monitoring );  10. No need any cable installation, just plug and play;  11.Support SD Card(up to 32G) recording for any evidence needed.   How to use: Connect camera with power supply, it starts to work.  At the same time, power on DVR and set it in the same channel with camera. Model: TE810H 2.4GHz Wireless Inspection Camera with 5-inch HD Mini DVR
Product name: TE810H 2.4GHz Wireless Inspection Camera with 5-inch HD Mini DVR
Product description: TE810H 2.4GHz Wireless Inspection Camera with 5-inch HD Mini DVR   The included portable wireless inspection camera is our company developed simple and convenient inspection instrument.It can be used to inspect hard-to-reach, darkness, dangerous places, such as:Auto   engine and gearing inspection; Medical inspection, like dental, skin   disease, gynecology, etc.; All kinds of pipe & tube, building   inspection; Antiterrorism search & rescue; Safety inspection;   Archeology, etc. Users can view the instant   inspection detail on this 5 inch HD screen. They also can   record videos and take pictures. Look over some recorded video   repeatedly to find out the source problem. If the video is not   satisfactory, users can delete it and rerecord. Model: CWT5005 GSM RTU GSM Gate Opener 2DI, 2DO, SMS control
Product name: CWT5005 GSM RTU GSM Gate Opener 2DI, 2DO, SMS control
Product description: CWT5005 GSM RTU  GSM Gate Opener 2DI, 2DO, SMS control                                                                                                             CWT5005 GSM RTU is designed as a cost effective remote   control system alert device. It monitors up to 2 dry contacts and 2   drivable relay outputs. User-defined SMS is sent to pre-configure mobile   phone numbers when a pre-defined alarm condition happens. These   pre-configured mobile phone numbers can belong to technicians or   engineers who are responsible in handling corresponding alarms. With the   aid of this GSM RTU, the alarm condition brings attention to in-charge   personnel immediately. Besides it allows those mobile phone users to   trigger any relay output by using SMS. The output can be connected with   alarm indication device, such as alarm, and others.                   There is a built-in microprocessor chip running on a   real-time operating system. It gives immediate response to any change in   both inputs and outputs condition. A GSM modem is embedded in the GSM   RTU, user has to subscribe a SIM card for the GSM RTU. The GSM RTU can   be installed in any location under GSM coverage.                     There is a built-in microprocessor chip running on a   real-time operating system. It gives immediate response to any change in   both inputs and outputs condition. A GSM modem is embedded in the RTU,   user has to subscribe a SIM card for the RTU. The RTU can be installed   in any location under GSM coverage.                                         2DI + 2DO +  sms alarm/control                                                                          Function Descriptions :                                     Advance features           Configurable for alarm and recover sms                  Automatically report the status of itself  on schedule                  Support remote setting via sms commands                  Preset 10 phone numbers(can be distributed  authority)                   Remote add/edit/delete phone group                  Automatically update internal clock via  sms                  Time stamped in alarm or recover messages                  Support ring call when alarm                  Temperature sensor (optional)                   Internal battery (optional)                  Easy used GUI configure software                  Adopted highly integrated industrial CPU                   Reliable performance with built-in double  watchdog                  Low maintenance, 24*7 operation                       2 digital inputs feature           NO or NC type can be preset                  Configurable for alarm and recover sms                  Configurable for alarm ensure time                  Configurable for alarm delay time                  Configurable for service number's authority of receive inputs alarm                  Remote query inputs status          2 relay drivable outputs                 Multiple output type can be preset                  Remote On/Off/Pulse outputs                  Configurable for pulse time                  Remote query outputs status                  Outputs can be activated by alarm or call                  Outputs can be activated on schedule

Product description: 3G Mobile WCDMA GSM 3G Video Box 3g video server portable    Specifications1.WCDMA GSM 3G Video Box   2.supporting WCDMA 3G network   3.Real-time video and audio surveillance   4.3g video server portable  Specifications 3g video server portable  1.WCDMA GSM 3G Video Box     2.supporting WCDMA 3G network     3.Real-time video and audio surveillance     4.SMS Remote Control            The Newest World Universal WCDMA GSM 3G Video Box 3g video server portable      Main functions:      3G video call        PAL/NTSC camera video & audio in        Picture motion detection        Alarm SMS and MMS picture        Video call/ Pictures saved in Micro SD        Audio call        2 ways alarm in & 1 way out        Self recharge Li-ion battery      1.Brief description 3g video server portable      With   this high-tech wireless equipment, you can detect anywhere at anytime   by dialing video calls with 3G mobile phone. The 3G video box can be   widely used in house, school, shop, moving cars, trains or take care of   elders and children as long as WCDMA network is available. Modern design   3G video box matches excellent 300,000 pixel camera with night vision   function. Withthe built-in high-light infrared LED, the camera can shoot   clear film even in darkness. The Remote camera has infrared motion   detector, you or your family or your guards can receive the alarm   message and picture when the sensor was triggered.      2. Features 3g video server portable      This product uses USIM card, supporting WCDMA 3G network.        Real-time video and audio surveillance: by your 3G phone, you can see area anytime and anywhere through        3G video call.        Video and Audio in.        You can send SMS to control the camera remotely.        Max 5 users and 2 alarm receivers supported        Two ways in for alarm signal        1 way out for alarm signal        Camera motion detection        Alarm message        Picture,video call files can be saved in SD card        Built-in Lithium battery: Rechargeable battery ensuring operation in case of external power failure        Application: taking care of the elders and children, in house, school, monitoring shop, bus, ship, and train etc.        Alarm in and out        You can connect alarming horn (Max 4V/100mA) with the camera with "alarm out" slot. When the securitydevice is alarmed, the alarming horn will active 60 seconds        You can also connect two wired alarm sensors to the video box. In "armed mode", the sensors signal will make the box alarm.      3.Parameter 3g video server portable      Network: Model A        HSDPA/UMTS 850/1900 MHz GPRS/GSM 850/900/1800 MHz      Model E      HSDPA/UMTS 900/2100 MHz GPRS/GSM 850/900/1800 MHz      Transfer rate:Down and up linkdata rate up to 384 kbps Video call standard:3GPP QCIF 176×144      Video record in SD card:320×240 Picture:640×480      Mirco SD (TF) support:8GB Max Adapter:12V 1A Li-ion:1500mAh Size:72mm×62mm×20mm Net weight (with battery):115g      4.Applications 3g video server portable      1) CCTV surveillance system upgrade: On the basis of the original CCTV monitoring / alarm system, you only need to connect video, audio, alarm signal to the 3G box. Then you can watch the video and get alarm SMS by your 3G cell phone.        2) WIFI CAMERA      5.Package Contain 3g video server portable      1 × main Video box        1 × adapter        1 × Video Audio cable      1 × Manual      1 x  antenna

Model: Defense 200 smartphone bug detector
Product name: Defense 200 smartphone bug detector
Product description: Defense 200 smartphone bug detector Malware could be infiltrate through emails or in any route. The malware is used to control your smart phone for eavesdropping.Defense 200 is a eavesdropping detector. It detects if your smart   phone is eavesdropping from somebody during the board meeting or private   conversation.Simply put the defense 200 top of your smart phone and keep on   talking in normal conversation. If the detector 200 is continuously   blinking, it tells your smart phone is being used for eavesdropping.   Detect your smart phone if it is safe to carry around for your business   meeting or private conversation.      Principle of product  When a hacker tries to hack your smart phone and   intercept your audio information data, this device detects specific   frequency band and informs user of unusual symptom by showing change of   detection lamp.  Eavesdropping occurs by hacking smart phone   -> Leakage detection of audio information data of smart phone->   Informing of unusual symptom by showing change of detection lamp  How to use device  Just power on the device and place it nearby smart   phone. Then, the device detects any unusual symptom such as hacking,   tapping etc automatically in real time.  Applicable Fields of Smart Phone Detector Defense 200      · When to worry about being tapped in daily life.    · State agencies where major policies are discussed and determined.    · Judicial authorities such as prosecution, police and so forth   that have investigation right, where communication security is required   for work performance.    · Election camps which perform election campaign against   competitors, such as Presidential election, general election, municipal   election, union election and so on.    · Lawyers and clients with ongoing litigation    · CEO, key executives, development department, sales and planning   department of companies with possibility of damage by industrial   espionage.    · Business sectors that require business confidentiality    · Government officers, attorneys, lobbyists, politicians,   diplomats, military officers, police officers and so forth, who handle   confidential information    · CEO of local government, and departments related to audit, urban development, various crackdowns and communication.    · Members of congress and representatives of local councils on legislative activities    · Board of elections that require confidentiality of crackdown information    · Government agencies and corporations that have frequent overseas affairs

Model: Secu-Plus smartphone bug blocking device and pen
Product name: Secu-Plus smartphone bug blocking device and pen
Product description: Secu-Plus smartphone bug blocking device and pen Due to the high technology of hearing clear voices from smart phones,   the receiving surrounding sound has been expanded with very clean   voice. In fact, the simple technology is causing the smart phone to   eavesdrop or wiretap victim’s personal life or business related   confidential conversation easily.Protect from eavesdropping surrounding conversation from your cell   phone. Simply, take out the Secu+ from the pen, and plug in to the ear   microphone terminal of your smart phone.Simple way to avoid anxious about someone eavesdropping your conversation from simple plug in  Secu-Plus!  Professional Security pen equipped with tapping block device of the conversation around smart phone!    This device protects that the conversation around smart phone is tapped by third party securely anywhere you are!!    Tapping block device of the conversation around smart phone, Secu-plus  Outline of product  It is obvious that advent of smart phones in all areas makes people's life more convenient and it is a modern convenience.    However,   there are many negative side effects of using smart phone such as   eavesdropping, hacking, Smishing or Pharming etc and they make us   anxious.    By using Secu-plus, it is possible to protect your conversation against tapping by third party.    This device is attached to a ball point pen so, it is easy to carry it.    Whenever   you need to protect your conversation, you can execute audio   information protection anywhere by simply installing this device on your   smart phone.  Principle of product  Smart phone has a high quality microphone to detect any sound or voice within a few meter radius.    If   a hacker implants a malicious code of tapping in your smart phone with   no need to install any extra tapping device in specific places, infected   phone works as tapping device and it leaks the conversation to third   party.    Embedded microphone inside smart phone could be abused for tapping by third party.    Secu-plus   blocks function of embedded microphone inside smart phone forcibly by   means of physical blocking and technical control.    Thus, it is   basically impossible to tap the conversation around smart phone and this   is the best way among other ways to prevent from tapping the   conversation around smart phone.  How to use device  Before important conversation or conference   begins, install Secu-plus to earphone jack on smart phone. As soon as it   is installed, tapping is impossible.    In case of making a call or taking a call in use, just detach Secu-plus from earphone jack.  Applicable Fields of Secu-plus      · When to worry about being tapped in daily life.    · State agencies where major policies are discussed and determined.    · Judicial authorities such as prosecution, police and so forth   that have investigation right, where communication security is required   for work performance.    · Election camps which perform election campaign against   competitors, such as Presidential election, general election, municipal   election, union election and so on.    · Lawyers and clients with ongoing litigation    · CEO, key executives, development department, sales and planning   department of companies with possibility of damage by industrial   espionage.    · Business sectors that require business confidentiality    · Government officers, attorneys, lobbyists, politicians,   diplomats, military officers, police officers and so forth, who handle   confidential information    · CEO of local government, and departments related to audit, urban development, various crackdowns and communication.    · Members of congress and representatives of local councils on legislative activities    · Board of elections that require confidentiality of crackdown information    · Government agencies and corporations that have frequent overseas affairs

Model: WH3M0WGSN1M0 WCDMA 3MP day / 1MP night IR wake up waterproof outdoor snapshot camera with built in battery and solar panel
Product name: WH3M0WGSN1M0 WCDMA 3MP day / 1MP night IR wake up waterproof outdoor snapshot camera with built in battery and solar panel
Product description: WH3M0WGSN1M0 WCDMA 3MP day / 1MP night IR waterproof outdoor snapshot camera   WCDMA waterproof outdoor snapshot camera used for remote surveillance solutions for when there is not WLAN or ethernet network connection available in outside buildings. The camera will take snapshot pictures at intervals and send back over a wireless HSPA/UMTS 3G connection via FTP, MMS, SMS or email to a smartphone or connected PC.  Main features:1.  There exists CMS for mass storage, which can manage up to three thousand front snapshot cameras and ten customer consoles to access on line at the same time2.  Support up to 3.0 Megapixel (2560x1920) image resolution3.  Adopting double image sensors and lens to get qualified pictures in both day and night; IR Led on only when snapshot to make it low power consumption4.  Built-in Web server for preview and configure via IE5.  Supporting Video clips recording functions6.  Supporting GSM/GPRS/EDGE/3G Mobile Network7.  Store and forward function.When the 3G network temporary is not available, the pictures will be stored in the camera and then be forwarded to the CMS or to FTP server when the mobile network is available8.  Supporting several power supplier modes:A. Main power supply (DC12V±10%)B. Sleeping mode camera use a samll solar panel to powered the built in Li battery directly9. Supporting multi communication ways (SMS, Email, FTP and smart and scalable integrated PC software).10. Picture snapshot trigged by several ways:A. On scheduled timeB. On command from user. User can command the camera to take pictures by PC client softwareC. SMS. User can send SMS to the camera to take picturesD. External Signal triggering. The camera can provide two external alarm signal interface (If for PIR, the camera can provide PIR voltage too)11. Up to 32 GB SD/SDHC local storage12. Watchdog built-in assure its stability   GSM/GPRS/WCDMA Remote Snapshot Solution OutlineThis Smart GSM/GPRS/3G Remote Camera system will capture a photo and send it to you via a cellular network. The picture's resolution can up to 3M(2560x1920). The Remote Camera also include a local storage SD card to avoid failure of the cellular network.This system is equipped with multiple I/O expansion and can be easily interfaced to external equipment and can also be expanded with audio hardware to allow remote listening. It can connect various surveillance sensors such as door magnet sensor, gas sensor,PIR sensor, smoke sensor, and so on.The camera can be trigged to capture by the following ways:On schedule timeOn demand from userSignal from one of the sensorsYou can command the Remote Camera to contact you via the following ways. FTP EMail MMS/SMS Integrated PC software. The system also integrate a set of PC software including central managemnt system server and user client. User can control the remote camera via the client software to do capture on demand. Main FeaturesThere is no additional constrains to SIM card(ie. Model: PET 210 GPS Pet collar tracker with iOS and Android tracking app
Product name: PET 210 GPS Pet collar tracker with iOS and Android tracking app
Product description: PET 210 GPS Pet collar tracker                                                                                                                                                                                  The PET 210 GPS pet tracker is the latest in GPS tracking technology for your pets. With thousands of pets going missing or being stolen, the PET 210 has a leading edge Android / iPhone APP,                             specially designed for PET-210 Pet Tracker so that you can track your pet from your smartphone.                             It supports Real-time Tracking, Geo-fence                             Alarm, Low Battery Alarm and History                             Playback, PET 210                              helps you keep in touch with your pet through                             Smart phone. If you pet leaves an area that has been geo fenced an alert will be sent directly to your smartphone to notify you.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     •  Set the Geo-Fence with   your iPhone or Smart  Phone via BLE4.0 technology.  　The working  range   is around 40 meters in open space.                    •  Built-in 710mA Li-Polymer battery, the working  time could last   around 1 year　 　as long as your pets are within the Geo-Fence  range.                    •  When your pets run away from the Geo-Fence  area, GPS will be   turned on 　　automatically and send an alarm to your phone and  show the   location on the 　map.                     •  Built-in u-Blox MAX7 GPS module to support fast positioning by AGPS   in the 　city area and by Cell ID even without GPS signal.                    •  Working with both Android & iOS APP.                     •  Support Smart Tracking Mode.                     •  Auto Power Saving.                     •  Support Low Power Alert.                     •  The device also features real-time tracking, so you can watch where   he goes, 　a  history function that logs doggie wanderings, and a   low-power alarm. Model: Octocopter BAT X900 aircraft, aluminium case, 9 channel WFT09 remote control, 1500mAh Lipo batterry, battery alarm & Imax B6 charger
Product name: Octocopter BAT X900 aircraft, aluminium case, 9 channel WFT09 remote control, 1500mAh Lipo batterry, battery alarm & Imax B6 charger
Product description: Octocopter BAT X900 aircraft, aluminium case, 9 channel WFT09 remote control, 1500mAh Lipo batterry, battery alarm & Imax B6 charger          Functions and features:      BAT X900 is a professional aerial photography octocopter aircraft for   application. Fuselage adopts folding design, easy to carry, quick and   flexible to operate, safe and stable to use, etc. It has been assembled   and adjusted well in factory, users only need simple installation and   can enjoy it.  Fuselage integrates battery installation board, power   divider, folding arms, GPS folding bracket, flight control LED lights   and quick release landing gear components. Motor base integrates   high-speed ESC. Landing gear adopts in-built shock absorption   components, folding gear, gimbal installation gear and image   transmission installation place. Modular design can realize flexible   collocation of the whole aircraft system and satisfy various of   application-level aerial photography demands. Specification  Brief IntroductionBAT   X900 is a professional aerial photography octocopter aircraft for   application. Fuselage adopts folding design, easy to carry, quick and   flexible to operate, safe and stable to use, etc. It has been assembled   and adjusted well in factory, users only need simple installation and   can enjoy it.  Fuselage   integrates battery installation board, power divider, folding arms, GPS   folding bracket, flight control LED lights and quick release landing   gear components. Motor base integrates high-speed ESC. Landing gear   adopts in-built shock absorption components, folding gear, gimbal   installation gear and image transmission installation place. Modular   design can realize flexible collocation of the whole aircraft system and   satisfy various of application-level aerial photography demands.Working Modes:  1). Manual Mode     2). GPS Auto Hovering Mode     3). Auto Navigation Mode     4). Auto Back Landing Mode  Technical Parameters :             Fuselage              Diagonal Motor Wheelbase      920      mm              Arm Length      422      mm              Center Board Diameter      230      mm              Max Spread Size      1260 x 1260 x 535      mm              Fuselage Weight (motors, ESC, propellers and flight control included)      2720      g              Landing Gear Size(gear down)      348 x 400 x 350      mm              Landing Gear Weight      630      g              System              Flight Control      YS-X4 V2 standard              Power              Motor      C3510  KV580              Propeller      1355  3K carbon fiber              ESC      3～6S  25A              Flight              Aircraft Weight      3.35kg              Take Off Weight      ≤7.7kg (available to Sony, GH2, GH3, etc.)              Battery      LiPo 6S 10000mAh~20000mAh  10~25C              Flight Time(no payload)      31min (6S 15000mAh LiPo，take off weight 5.05kg)               Working Temperature      5～40℃              Wind Resistance      <5.4m/s (6.5kg take off weight）

Model: WP-BW2001 2D1+2CIF / 4HD1 / 4CIF+ 4CH Audio& 4Video & 4Playback & 4 CCTV POWER SUPPLY + G-SENSOR mobile HDD DVR
Product name: WP-BW2001 2D1+2CIF / 4HD1 / 4CIF+ 4CH Audio& 4Video & 4Playback & 4 CCTV POWER SUPPLY + G-SENSOR mobile HDD DVR
Product description: WP-BW2001 2D1+2CIF / 4HD1 / 4CIF+ 4CH Audio& 4Video & 4Playback & 4 CCTV POWER SUPPLY + G-SENSOR mobile HDD DVR                          Basic 4CH Hard-disk Mobile DVR              Model：WP-BW2000                Overview:        WP-BW2000 is an advanced Mobile Video Recorder specially designed  for vehicle surveillance solution and intelligent application. Model: WE800A 2.4GHz Wireless Inspection Camera (90 deg VOA; 520TVL 720X586pix, 8 meters night view)
Product name: WE800A 2.4GHz Wireless Inspection Camera (90 deg VOA; 520TVL 720X586pix, 8 meters night view)
Product description: WE800 2.4GHz Wireless Inspection Camera--WE800 (90 deg VOA;520TVL 720X586pix,8 meters night view)This   portable wireless inspection camera is our company newly-developed   simple and convenient inspection instrument. It’s a new product combined   the technology of electronics, optics and 2.4GHz wireless. It’s very   small size and light weight, very convenient to carry.        It   can be used in the dangerous & complicated surroundings, like   high-altitude working. It’s easy operated and powered by high capacity   Li-battery with 1.5 hours continuous working time. High brightness LED/IR offers long visible range up to 8 meters. Moreover, it offers high definition video and good performance.   If it works with our wireless DVR-TE968H, users can as inspect   according to video, as record. Look over some recorded video repeatedly.   If the video is not satisfactory, users can delete it and rerecord. DVR   memory is large up to 32GB.If it works with wireless USB receiver,   users can view instant video in computer, and record, edit and print the   inspection report.      Application  Auto   engine and gearing inspection; Medical inspection, like dental, skin   disease, gynecology, etc.; All kinds of pipe & tube, building   inspection; Antiterrorism search & rescue; Safety inspection;   Archeology, etc.    Note: 3 types of lamps available, please choose 1 type when you order:(1) 6 bright LED lamps: 5 meters of night vision(2) 6 invisble light IR940 lamps: 5 meters of night vision(3) 6  invisble light IR850 lamps: 8 meters of night vision   Selling points:*Super small size  & light weight, very convenient to carry;*High resolution 720X576pix(PAL),720x480pix(NTSC),520TVL,offers good quality video;*6 LED/IR lamps offers 5 or 8 meters clear view in complete darkness.(LED can be turned off too;IR is invisble light);*High capacity built-in Li-battery offers power supply anywhere;*No need any installation, and very easy to operate, just power on and it works!* First complete wireless mini inspection camera with LED/IR in the world! Specification:  Outline Image:

Model: WH5M0WGSN1M0 WCDMA 5MP day / 1MP night IR wake up waterproof outdoor snapshot camera with built in battery and solar panel
Product name: WH5M0WGSN1M0 WCDMA 5MP day / 1MP night IR wake up waterproof outdoor snapshot camera with built in battery and solar panel
Product description: WH5M0WGSN1M0 WCDMA 5MP day / 1MP night IR wake up waterproof outdoor snapshot camera with built in battery and solar panelWCDMA waterproof outdoor snapshot camera used for remote surveillance   solutions for when there is not WLAN or ethernet network connection   available in outside buildings. The camera will take snapshot pictures   at intervals and send back over a wireless HSPA/UMTS 3G connection via   FTP, MMS, SMS or email to a smartphone or connected PC. Main features:1.    There exists CMS for mass storage, which can manage up to three   thousand front snapshot cameras and ten customer consoles to access on   line at the same time2.  Support up to 5.0 Megapixel (2560x1920) image resolution3.    Adopting double image sensors and lens to get qualified pictures in   both day and night; IR Led on only when snapshot to make it low power   consumption4.  Built-in Web server for preview and configure via IE5.  Supporting Video clips recording functions6.  Supporting GSM/GPRS/EDGE/3G Mobile Network7.  Store and forward function.When   the 3G network temporary is not available, the pictures will be stored   in the camera and then be forwarded to the CMS or to FTP server when the   mobile network is available8.  Supporting several power supplier modes:A. Main power supply (DC12V±10%)B. Sleeping mode camera use a samll solar panel to powered the built in Li battery directly9. Supporting multi communication ways (SMS, Email, FTP and smart and scalable integrated PC software).10. Picture snapshot trigged by several ways:A. On scheduled timeB. On command from user. User can command the camera to take pictures by PC client softwareC. SMS. User can send SMS to the camera to take picturesD.   External Signal triggering. The camera can provide two external alarm   signal interface (If for PIR, the camera can provide PIR voltage too)11. Up to 32 GB SD/SDHC local storage12. Watchdog built-in assure its stability         GSM/GPRS/WCDMA Remote Snapshot Solution      OutlineThis Smart GSM/GPRS/3G Remote Camera system will capture a photo and   send it to you via a cellular network. The picture's resolution can up   to 5M(2560x1920). The Remote Camera also include a local storage SD card   to avoid failure of the cellular network.This system is equipped with multiple I/O expansion and can be easily   interfaced to external equipment and can also be expanded with audio   hardware to allow remote listening. It can connect various surveillance   sensors such as door magnet sensor, gas sensor,PIR sensor, smoke sensor,   and so on.The camera can be trigged to capture by the following ways:            On schedule time              On demand from user              Signal from one of the sensors      You can command the Remote Camera to contact you via the following ways.             FTP               EMail               MMS/SMS               Integrated PC software. The system also integrate a set of PC   software including central managemnt system server and user client. User   can control the remote camera via the client software to do capture on   demand.          Main Features            There is no additional constrains to SIM card(ie. The device can work well even if the SIM card with private IP address)              High definition up to 5M(2560x1920)              Various image formats(2560x1920, 2048x1536,1600x1200,1280x960,640x480,320x240)              Multi functional trigging ways(On schedule,On demand, Signal trigging)              Multi communction ways(MMS, Email, Ftp, smart and scalable integrated PC software)              JPEG compression              Supporting local storage              Lens can be selectable              Device scallable      Application domains            Geology and forestry monitoring rockslides, floods, fires, wildlife and vandalism              Transformer station surveillance              Construction site monitoring working progress and valuable equipment              Ferryboats, dredges and other marine acquiring the pictures you require from the vessel              Oil and gas pipelines surveillance              Power station surveillance              GSM BS Surveillance              Home surveillance              Traffic control      Snapshot Central Menagement System(CMS)                          Specification:            Parts      Items      WH5M0WGSN1M0              Camera      Image Sensor      1/2.7"  3.0 Megapixel CMOS Sensor(For Day time)          1/4"  1.0 Megapixel CMOS sensor (For Night time)              Min. Illumination      Color: 0.2Lux @ F1.2 , B / W: 0.02Lux @ F1.2              Electronic Shutter      1/25s~1/100,000s              Day/Night      Auto-switch, 3.0Megapixel(Day); 1.0 Megapixel(Night)          To get qualified images in both day and night              Lens Mount      C/CS              Compression Standard      Picture Format      JPEG              Video H.264      Optional              Image      Max. Resolution      2560x1920              Video Parameter      Saturation, Brightness, Contrast adjustable              GSM/GPRS          Network      Protocols      TCP/IP,HTTP,FTP,DHCP,DNS,DDNS,NTP              Frequency bands      GSM/GPRS/EDGE:1900/1800/900/850MHz              Maximum data transmission rate      GPRS: 42.8(UL)/85.6(DL) kbps              Media Transportation      FTP, Email              Interface      Intelligent Notify      Power Failed, Storage exception              PIR interface      Support external PIR              Alarm Input      2 channel              Alarm Output      1 channel              Local Storage      Support SD/SDHC              SMS      Support              Basics      Anti-flicker, Heartbeat, Password Protection              General      Operating Condition      -10°~60° Humidity 90% or less              Weather Proof      IP66              Power Supply      Support DC12V±10% and solar panel powered the built in libattery directly              Power Consumption      8W MAX

Model: Walkera QR TALI H500 GPS Drone with DEVO F12E remote, G-3D gimbal , ilook plus camera, battery & charger
Product name: Walkera QR TALI H500 GPS Drone with DEVO F12E remote, G-3D gimbal , ilook plus camera, battery & charger
Product description: Walkera QR TALI H500 GPS Drone with DEVO F12E remote, G-3D gimbal , ilook plus camera, battery & charger    One Stop Solution for Aerial Filming  Presenting the Walkera TALI H500 GPS Drone w/ FPV SystemThe TALI H500 GPS Drone is Walkera's respond to the Ready to Fly Aerial   Filming drone market. It is a GPS drone, yes, which should be targeted   for beginners, but  we find  this drone a bit different from others.We found that you better choose GPS to fly, and switch to Manual mode   for landing, so the drone can perform smoother landing, if you use GPS   mode to land the drone may bounce when it's near the ground.What's good about the TALI H500 GPS Drone??Well, it's a 500 class Hexacopter   with everything integrated by   factory. The best part is the built-in 5" FPV monitor on the DEVO F12E   transmitter, no other brand has such RC transmitter with big  FPV   monitor on it. The TALI H500 does a good job for aerial filming, it's   pretty stable and all setup by factory. When you receive the H500, just   take it out of the box, put on the gimbal and camera, charge the battery   and read the manual carefully (I'm not kidding, please read the manual CAREFULLY), then you are ready to fly, all switch on the transmitter are preset from factory, the manual will tell you how to use them.One stop solution, it includes EVERYTHING to shoot aerial footage.Open   box ready to shoot video - Included the H500 Drone, a 12-Ch RC   controller with 5"  FPV Monitor, HD Camera on a 3-Axis Gimbal,  Battery   and Charger.... everything!Walkera "iLook+" HD camera on the Walkera G-3D 3-Axis Brushless GimbalIt's   a 13 megapixel HD camera with FPV system onboard, able to transmit   video back on the ground. The Walkera G-3D 3-Axis gimbal can  compensate   the drone movement and gives you well stabilized video footage, this is   good stuff!The H500 can fly for 20-25 minutes with the 22.2V 5400mah battery cartridge  The   package came with a 22.2V 5400mah battery pack, gives you around 20-25   minutes of flight time. The best part is the built-in 5" FPV monitor on the DEVO F12E   transmitter, no other brand has such RC transmitter with big  FPV   monitor on it. Model: CWT5005B 3G / GSM RTU GSM Gate Opener 2DI, 2DO, SMS control
Product name: CWT5005B 3G / GSM RTU GSM Gate Opener 2DI, 2DO, SMS control
Product description: CWT5005B 3G / GSM RTU GSM Gate Opener 2DI, 2DO, SMS control                                                                                                              CWT5005 GSM RTU is designed as a cost effective remote   control system alert device. It monitors up to 2 dry contacts and 2   drivable relay outputs. User-defined SMS is sent to pre-configure mobile   phone numbers when a pre-defined alarm condition happens. These   pre-configured mobile phone numbers can belong to technicians or   engineers who are responsible in handling corresponding alarms. With the   aid of this GSM RTU, the alarm condition brings attention to in-charge   personnel immediately. Besides it allows those mobile phone users to   trigger any relay output by using SMS. The output can be connected with   alarm indication device, such as alarm, and others.                   There is a built-in microprocessor chip running on a   real-time operating system. It gives immediate response to any change in   both inputs and outputs condition. A GSM modem is embedded in the GSM   RTU, user has to subscribe a SIM card for the GSM RTU. The GSM RTU can   be installed in any location under GSM coverage.                     There is a built-in microprocessor chip running on a   real-time operating system. It gives immediate response to any change in   both inputs and outputs condition. A GSM modem is embedded in the RTU,   user has to subscribe a SIM card for the RTU. The RTU can be installed   in any location under GSM coverage.                                         2DI + 2DO +  sms alarm/control                                                                          Function Descriptions :                                     Advance features           Configurable for alarm and recover sms                  Automatically report the status of itself  on schedule                  Support remote setting via sms commands                  Preset 10 phone numbers(can be distributed  authority)                   Remote add/edit/delete phone group                  Automatically update internal clock via  sms                  Time stamped in alarm or recover messages                  Support ring call when alarm                  Temperature sensor (optional)                   Internal battery (optional)                  Easy used GUI configure software                  Adopted highly integrated industrial CPU                   Reliable performance with built-in double  watchdog                  Low maintenance, 24*7 operation                       2 digital inputs feature           NO or NC type can be preset                  Configurable for alarm and recover sms                  Configurable for alarm ensure time                  Configurable for alarm delay time                  Configurable for service number's authority of receive inputs alarm                  Remote query inputs status          2 relay drivable outputs                 Multiple output type can be preset                  Remote On/Off/Pulse outputs                  Configurable for pulse time                  Remote query outputs status                  Outputs can be activated by alarm or call                  Outputs can be activated on schedule

Model: TK12 magnetic portable waterproof asset gps tracking device with internal 2200mAh battery
Product name: TK12 magnetic portable waterproof asset gps tracking device with internal 2200mAh battery
Product description: TK12 magnetic portable waterproof asset gps tracking device with internal 2200mAh battery    Introduction:    The TK12 magnetic portable waterproof asset gps tracking device is designed   to survive in the harsh conditions, delivering regular and accurate   locationrecords using state of the art GPS over the cellular network,   the TK12 delivers superb performance less expensively than ever   before. Built toexacting specifications,the TK12 is weatherproof and   durable. With the built-insuper-magnets in the case, make it an ideal   manager for remote and un-poweredinstallations such as heavy   construction equipment, RV’s and vehicles of all descriptions. With its   super-magnet case, the TK12 can be installed under avehicle for a   quick and accurate covert tracking installation.    Flexible in   its programming options, the TK12 can be easily reprogrammed via SMS   bythe user to set and reset it’s scheduled and motion detected   locationreporting. The TK12 also supports a deep sleep function, and   with itsinternal 2200mAh rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery, can wait for a   month in atrue “sleeping standby” for motion or vibration to wake it   into pre-programmedperiodic location reporting when it starts moving. The TK12 comes with a tracking application for PC and a mobile client version for iOS and Android smartphones and tablet PCs.   Features:            Quad Band GSM, Enable to Work Worldwide              U-Blox GPS Chip, 50 Channels, Accuracy:10m              Weather-Proof; Industrial Strength Magnet              Magnetic Mount Allow to Attach and Remove from Any Metal Surface Easily              Circular Geo-fencing, Remote Listen-in              Tracking on Movement/ Standby on Motionless              Different Report Basing on Movement/Motionless              2200mAh Battery, Max 90 Days Standby (1 report per day),              Capacity 2200mAh, 8800mAh, 15400mAh Optional              Multiple Power Saving Mode Available              SMS/GPRS Tracking and Query              Address, Position, Map Link Available on Query        Specifications:                    Size        105x 60x 23mm (LxWxH)                    Storage Temperature        -40 to 85 °C                    Operating Temperature        -10 to 55 °C                    GPS Module        U-BLOX G6010-ST, 50 channel                    Antenna        Built-in                    Sensitivity        Tracking: –161 dBm            Cold starts: –148 dBm          Hot starts: –156 dBm          Cold start: <27s          Warm Start: <5s          Hot Start: 1s                    A-GPS        AssistNow Online and AssistNow Offline services,   OMA SUPL compliant                    GPRS        MTK 6223D            Quad band:850/900/1800/1900 MHz,          GPRS Class 12          Antenna:Built-in                    Power supply        Rechargeable, 2200 mAh, Lithium-Ion Battery, Charging powerUSB, 5V                    Motion sensor        Built-in                    Case        ABS plastic                    Weight        180g
